ratings.question_text: Your level of engagement with the course was:
What is your overall assessment of this course?
The course was well organized to facilitate student learning.
I received clear feedback that improved my learning.
Relative to other courses you have taken at Yale, the level of intellectual challenge of this course was:
Relative to other courses you have taken at Yale, the workload of this course was:

narratives.question_text: What knowledge, skills, and insights did you develop by taking this course?
comments: I learned to speak, write and understand Italian on a deeper level. I also learned more about Italian culture.
This was a great way to learn Italian in a faced paced and fun environment!
Learned how to generally converse in Italian and about some important basics of Italian culture! Things that would surely help anyone appreciate Italy and Italian culture.
I further developed my conversational Italian skills and expanded my knowledge of the culture.
I learned how to improve my conversational skills in Italian.

narratives.question_text: What are the strengths and weaknesses of this course and how could it be improved?
comments: At points, I felt as though I was lost because the professor was talking too quickly but they always would help out if we did not understand a task or an assignment. I felt as though this class was perfectly balanced between the two professors.

Strengths: Instructors were very knowledgeable and helpful/accommodating, course load keeps you engaged, amount of work was enough to promote further understanding without being overwhelming
Weaknesses: N/A

It is very rapid paced, and making sure every minute and activity is being spent purposefully is essential. Making sure that the homeworks, activities, and tests are all specifically in line with the goals of that week is massively helpful.

I feel the course had a very good mix of ways to learn and practice the language. I think this course could be improved by receiving more feedback on essays and videos. Or giving more of a guide for what the final video should look like.
It was a little tough over zoom but the teachers made it engaging every day.

narratives.question_text: Would you recommend this course to another student? Please explain.
comments: Yes. I really enjoyed taking this class and the professors were phenomenal!
Yes, it was a great way to further my mastery of Italian
Yes! Amazing class super productive and supportive!
Yes, if you have the time to dedicate yourself to the material and have a decent incoming understanding of L1 and L2 I would recomend.
I would recommend this course to anyone who wants to learn Italian.
Yes if they would like to learn Italian I would recommend this course.
